articles.title: WATCH: Mohammad Rizwan refuses to shake hands with female members of Glenn McGrath's family at the SCG - Times of India
articles.description: Cricket News: Australia confidently secured an emphatic eight-wicket triumph against Pakistan at the Sydney Cricket Ground, concluding a 3-0 Test series domination
articles.content: Indian bowlers face tall task, Rohit seeks redemption
